name: An Video Game
description:
An Video Game made for Something Awful Game Development Challenge X (2015). The theme for the jam was "Critical Omission".

Features:

  • You get to play An Video Game
  • Re-playability! In fact multiple playthroughs are HIGHLY RECCOMMENDED.
  • Learn about the secret herbs and spices of KFC
  • Featuring Special Guest: AnimeSteve1993
  • Secrets! There's a bunch of secrets in this game!
  • Bad Jokes! Voiced by the developer of this game.

This game takes 10-15 minutes to get through. Multiple playthroughs are recommended.

Credits

  • Game By: Afal
  • Credits Music is Mr Trumpet by Ketsa (https://ketsa.bandcamp.com/) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 License
  • Testing by TomSmizzle and Twitter User Piss Wizard.
